"Room looks clear," said Ravenchief as he reached the back of the room and
turned around.

Guardia approached the CR chamber and started to access it's controls, which
still appeared to function.

"There's someone in this chamber." she said. "It's in stasis mode, signature
appears to be... Maximal."
